result.description: Overall System Architecture and Interfaces – First Iteration: Presentation of the overall system architecture, definition of all the defined layers of SESAME architecture including functional description of sub-modules, interfaces and data to be exchanged. result.title: Evaluation of Use Cases
result.description: This document provides a concise summary of selected use cases, how they have been deployed with CYCLONE, and formal feedback on the CYCLONE software. Preliminary market analysis and business model investigations will be reported in a dedicated chapter of this report.

result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: The use of a Data Management Plan (DMP) is required for projects participating in the Open Research Data Pilot in Horizon 2020, in the form of a deliverable in the first 6 months of the project. The deliverable, comprising the type of data generated/collected on the project, the standards to be used, the exploitation of the data for verification and re-use and the preservation of the data, will be generated during the first six months of the project.

result.title: Project specific website
result.description: Design and creation of a project website presenting the importance and the benefits of the conversion to the new processes based on a number of examples and case studies. This website will act as an information repository regarding the developments, for the public, but also for EC members. It will be linked to social websites (LinkedIn, YouTube), allowing users to participate in the main discussions regarding the project results, while rising the interest in the project’s outcomes.
